name: Penguin Adventure
overview:
This Game is a MSX bootleg from orignal game released in MSX.

(夢大陸アドベンチャー, Yume Tairiku Adobenchā, lit. "Dream Continent Adventure") is an action-adventure platform video game released by Konami in 1986, and a sequel to 1983's Antarctic Adventure. The game marks the professional debut of game designer Hideo Kojima, who was assistant designer on the project.[2]

The story follows Penta, a penguin who has to bring home a golden apple in order to cure Penguette, the Penguin Princess.
